name: BarFinder
0:
”Alexa ask Bar Finder for a random bar”
”ask Bar Finder for a dive bar near me”
”ask Bar Finder for a wine bar in New York City”
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: bar finder
des:
Want to go out but can't decide on a bar to go to? Use Bar Finder to ask Alexa for random bar recommendations! Just ask her for a random bar and she'll give you the name of a bar within 1 mile of your location. You can ask her follow up questions about the bar, how expensive it is, its yelp rating, how far away it is and its hours! All bar information is taken from Yelp

Currently supported bar types: wine bars, sports bars, dive bars, gay bars, karaoke bars, irish pubs, night clubs and dance clubs
